/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic -Wl,-rpath -Wl,/opt/mvapich2-1.8-r5423/gcc/lib CMakeFiles/MetisGeomExp.dir/adjtocsr.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MetisGeomExp.dir/main.cpp.o  -o MetisGeomExp   -L/home/mas/17/cdsbhat/metis-5.1.0/lib  -L/home/mas/17/cdsbhat/parmetis-4.0.3/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/home/mas/17/cdsbhat/metis-5.1.0/lib:/home/mas/17/cdsbhat/parmetis-4.0.3/lib:/opt/mvapich2-1.8-r5423/gcc/lib /opt/mvapich2-1.8-r5423/gcc/lib/libmpichcxx.so /opt/mvapich2-1.8-r5423/gcc/lib/libmpich.so /opt/mvapich2-1.8-r5423/gcc/lib/libopa.so /opt/mvapich2-1.8-r5423/gcc/lib/libmpl.so -lpthread -lrdmacm -libverbs -libumad -ldl -lrt -Wl,-Bstatic -lparmetis -lmetis -Wl,-Bdynamic
